mapper.update: update t_trackinglist_preprocessing f set f.c_orderid=#{cOrderID},f.assemble_time=#{assembleTime},f.production_time=#{productionTime},f.preprocessing_pn=#{preprocessingPn},f.pt_option=#{ptOption},f.pt_option2=#{ptOption2},f.serial_no=#{serialNo},f.workorder_no=#{workorderNo}, f.inspect_time=#{inspectTime},f.inspect_operator=#{inspectOperator},f.remarks=#{remarks},f.preprocessing_model=#{preprocessingModel},f.exception_record=#{exceptionRecord}, f.assemble_Operator=#{assembleOperator},f.operatorid=#{operatorid},f.update_time=now() where f.preprocessing_id=#{preprocessingID}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_trackinglist_preprocessing WHERE preprocessing_id in
#{item}

DELETE FROM t_trackinglist_preprocessing_assemble WHERE preprocessing_id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select preprocessing_id preprocessingID,component_name componentName,component_no componentNo,serial_no_record serialNoRecord,remarks from t_trackinglist_preprocessing_assemble f where f.preprocessing_id=#{preprocessingID}

select preprocessing_id preprocessingID,selfcheck_name selfcheckName,selfcheck_content selfcheckContent,selfcheck_result selfcheckResult,remarks from t_trackinglist_preprocessing_inspect f where f.preprocessing_id=#{preprocessingID}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_trackinglist_preprocessing_inspect WHERE preprocessing_id in
#{item}
mapper.update: update t_ums_setting_preprocessing f set f.preprocessing_pn=#{preprocessingPn},f.operatorid=#{operatorid},f.update_time=now() where f.psid=#{psid}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_ums_setting_preprocessing WHERE psid in
#{item}

DELETE FROM t_ums_setting_preprocessing_assemble WHERE psid in
#{item}

#{item}
mapper.select: select psid,component_name componentName,component_no componentNo,serial_no_record serialNoRecord,remarks from t_ums_setting_preprocessing_assemble f where f.psid=#{psid}
select psid,selfcheck_name selfcheckName,selfcheck_content selfcheckContent,selfcheck_result selfcheckResult,remarks from t_ums_setting_preprocessing_inspect f where f.psid=#{psid}
